arn.description: the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the custom plugin.

contentType.description: The type of the plugin file. Allowed values are `ZIP` and `JAR`.

description.description: A summary description of the custom plugin.

latestRevision.description: an ID of the latest successfully created revision of the custom plugin.

location.description:
Information about the location of a custom plugin. See below.

The following arguments are optional:

name.description: The name of the custom plugin..

state.description: the state of the custom plugin.
